s1.title: General information
s1.p: Apache Cocoon is a web development framework built around the concepts of component-based web development and separation of concerns, ensuring that people can interact and collaborate on a project without stepping on each other toes.

The purpose of these pages is to provide a webapp to be used in testing Cocoon itself. These pages are not intended to be read by humans - rather to be read by automated tests that are a part of Cocoon itself.
